short.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Errator brings javascript errors front and center.
short.bn: Errator জাভাস্ক্রিপ্ট ত্রুটি সামনে এবং কেন্দ্র এটি.
short.de: Errator bringt JavaScript Fehler Front und Center.
short.es: Errator trae errores de javascript frontales y central.
short.fr: Errator apporte des erreurs javascript avant et centrale.
short.hi: Errator जावास्क्रिप्ट त्रुटियों सामने और केन्द्र लाता है.
short.ja: ErratorのJavaScriptエラーがフロントとセンターをもたらします。
short.pt_BR: Errator traz erros de javascript frontais e central.
short.ru: Errator приносит наличие ошибок фронт и центр.
short.zh_CN: Errator带来的前沿和中心javascript错误。
short.zh_TW: Errator帶來的前沿和中心javascript錯誤。

long.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Errator is a simple yet useful extension that brings javascript errors front and center to your main Chrome toolbar.

0.0.4

Add i18n support for major languages.  Errator is 100% localizable.

0.0.3

Added options for whitelisting and blacklisting url patterns.  Errator now defaults to run only on whitelisted domains.  See the extension options to change Errator to run on all pages except those in the exclusion blacklist.

0.0.2

 Clicking the Errator icon opens a log of caught javascript errors and their stack traces in a Chrome popup.

0.0.1

Initial release
long.bn,de,es,fr,hi,ja,pt_BR,ru,zh_CN,zh_TW:
Errator is a simple yet useful extension that brings javascript errors front and center to your main Chrome toolbar.

0.0.3

Added options for whitelisting and blacklisting url patterns.  Errator now defaults to run only on whitelisted domains.  See the extension options to change Errator to run on all pages except those in the exclusion blacklist.

0.0.2

 Clicking the Errator icon opens a log of caught javascript errors and their stack traces in a Chrome popup.

0.0.1

Initial release
